entry.title: Taproot NACK
entry.summary: The context mentions about a troll who keeps trolling and the bitcoin-dev list is giving attention to it. The author suggests that depending on the topic raised, it may be useful to answer the troll naively as if it were an honest question so that third parties do not get confused and think that the troll is bringing up some objection that is actually relevant. However, for the particular topic being discussed, the relevance of the previous British empire is little more than a reality TV show about the British royal family, and any claims to nobility or aristocracy are largely moot and thus not worth answering.
